name: Realis
description:
An isometric single-player 3D exploration game about Humanity

In Realis you play as Bo, a scientist from an alternative reality who is in search for the reason behind humanity's demise.

Main Features:

  • Explore an abandoned room;
  • Investigate and analyze clues;
  • Self-reflect about the essence of humanity;

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to walk

"E" to interact

"CTRL" to crouch

"ESC" to pause
